name: Sky Ace
description:
Sky Ace is a turn-based tactical strategy game designed for two competing players. Sky Ace combines the rules and feeling of aerial combat, with the strategy and decision making of traditional tactical strategy games. Aircraft are designed replicate air combat as much as possible, with movement and attacks designed around "chasing" enemy aircraft, and lining up attacks with their rear, as well as using strategy and forward planning in regards to other allied units to protect your own aircraft and prevent your opponent from attacking you.

(NOTE: this is a first semester build and does contain bugs and non finished features)
